title: Man killed in Panjgur - Pakistan - DAWN.COM
content:
GWADAR: Unknown armed men killed a person in Panjgur town on Monday.

According to police, Abdul Rehman was shopping in the main bazaar in the Chatikan area along with his family when the gunmen opened fire on him.

He received multiple bullet injuries and died on the spot. Other members of his family remained unhurt.

Police rushed to the site after the incident and shifted the body to the Panjgur district hospital.

Police termed the incident targeted killing. Further investigation is underway.

No one has claimed responsibility for the attack.

Published in Dawn, February 4th, 2025
